thread.section_title: OneSimCard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OneSimCard | www.onesimcard.com | 2 of 17
thread.title: Victor Svec

author: Victor Svec
title: Victor Svec
text: I have been using OneSimCard for my international travels for over four years. Having the assurance of being able to call from anywhere or to have others call me for a very reasonable cost per minute is great. I have used this sim card on 3 continents in more countries than I can count. It's always ready. The small additional cost of having a local (USA) number for family and friends to call toll free while I am abraod is icing on the cake. Great service from these folks and an easy website to manage your account.
